title: VirtualBox 7.0.10 Brings Initial Support for Linux Kernels 6.4, 6.5
description:
VirtualBox 7.0.10 adds initial support for Linux kernel 6.4 for guests and hosts as well as initial support for Linux kernel 6.5 only for hosts. Learn more here.

The post VirtualBox 7.0.10 Brings Initial Support for Linux Kernels 6.4, 6.5 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Solus Is Back, but Can It Survive Its Troubled Past?
description:
With Ikey Doherty again taking a central role in the Solus Project, it’s a fair question to ask how long he will stay before abandoning Solus once more.

The post Solus Is Back, but Can It Survive Its Troubled Past? appeared first on Linux Today.

title: AlmaLinux Opts for Kinder, Gentler Course in RHEL Clone Conflict
description:
AlmaLinux “has decided to drop the aim to be 1:1 with RHEL. AlmaLinux OS will instead aim to be application binary interface compatible.”

The post AlmaLinux Opts for Kinder, Gentler Course in RHEL Clone Conflict appeared first on Linux Today.

title: NVIDIA 535.86.05 Improves Wayland Support, Fixes Bugs
description:
NVIDIA 535.86.05 further improves Wayland support by addressing a video memory leak that occurred when turning off a connected monitor.

The post NVIDIA 535.86.05 Improves Wayland Support, Fixes Bugs appeared first on Linux Today.
